DOC.brief_summary: We hypothesized that the Intubrite Video Laryngoscope System VLS 6600 is beneficial for intubation of pediatric manikins while performing CPR. In the current study, we compared effectiveness of the Intubrite and MIL laryngoscopes in child resuscitation with and without CC.
DOC.criteria: Give voluntary consent to participate in the study minimum 1 year of work experience in emergency medicine experienced emergency medical personnel (physicians, nurses, paramedics) Not meet the above criteria Wrist or Low back diseases
